definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: The contour of that mountain looks like a dragon.
sentences.chinese: 那座大山的表面看上去像一条龙。

sentences.english: Straddling the ridge of a mountain range shaped like a dragon’s back is, appropriately enough, Dragon’s Back Trail.
sentences.chinese: 横跨山脉的形状像龙的背，真的像一条龙在那里。

sentences.english: There is a dragon engraved around the stone pillar.
From the raw material feeding into the machine to the dry sheet jelly packaging, it is a continuous automatic closed production line.
sentences.chinese: 从原料入机到干粉皮包装全自动，全封闭一条龙生产。

sentences.english: The contour of SanSI English'symbol looks like a dragon.
sentences.chinese: 三思英语标志的轮廓看上去像一条龙。

sentences.english: "Great Wall is like a dragon, " he said.
From fabric production to the production of apparel products through-train.
sentences.chinese: 可以从面料生产到服装成品一条龙的生产。

sentences.english: Room and board one-stop service, security, rest assured that well-developed logistics industry.
sentences.chinese: 吃住一条龙服务，安全放心，物流业发达。

sentences.english: Our company is the first Coordinated Process Company to supply and manufacture rinks in China.
sentences.chinese: 本公司是国内首家真冰滑冰场供应制作一条龙企业。

sentences.english: " He likes to think of the splash of paint on this bottle as "a little dragon.
sentences.chinese: 他猜想上面的溅上的斑点痕迹可能是一条龙。

sentences.english: At the same time, for the farmers to provide one-stop technical support and benefit guarantee.
sentences.chinese: 同时，为广大农民提供一条龙的技术支持和效益保障。

sentences.english: Verminaard's placed our children under the guard of a dragon.
sentences.chinese: 猛敏那派了一条龙来囚禁我们的孩子。

sentences.english: The dragonfly becomes a dragon in his dream.
sentences.chinese: 在他的梦中，那只蜻蜓变成了一条龙。

sentences.english: There’s a dragon behind the door.
We also can provide customers with one-stop product solutions.
sentences.chinese: 可为客户提供一条龙的产品解决方案。

definition: to go smoothly/to come off/to succeed
to collude with/to collaborate/(basketball) hook shot
to strike back/to beat back/to counterattack
to return a compliment/to give sth in return
to deal the fatal blow (sports, chess etc)/to score the winning point
